
An intern reused nonces while signing two messages with ECDSA. Can you retrieve the private key? Here are the signatures: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493f5ee204b59f1fb3acffed3012c489cb2ed6024106f0339129a55b1ebd3be4d938
